resources.string: Round 1: You will be given with a String. The final target is to generate an anagram of a palindrome by removing letters one at a time. Player 2 is the Computer. If you win, you go to the next Round, else Game terminates. \n\n Round 2: There is a grid of 4x4 . U will be given 4 toys which are to be placed in the grid such that each column and row should have a toy. Constraint is that if there is a toy in a row , you cannot place the next toy in the row , column and diagonals of the current toy's location.
